panels.description: Total rate of messages published to kafka, including those not being consumed due to backpressure
panels.title: Estimated kafka input rate

panels.description: Percentage of time the synchronous policy executor was busy in each time period. 100% means it is executing as fast as it can and is saturated.
panels.title: Scheduler busy time

panels.description: Percentage of time the synchronous policy executor was busy in each time period. 100% means it is executing as fast as it can and is saturated.
panels.title: Sync policy executor busy time

panels.description: Percentage of time the synchronous policy executor was busy in each time period. 100% means it is executing as fast as it can and is saturated.
panels.title: Kafka async policy executor busy time

panels.description: An estimate of the age of the oldest item in the queue. Gives a measure of how long items are queued for.
panels.title: Queue age

Request completions to policy result ratio

targets.expr: sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_seconds_total{container="taskmanager", pod=~"aiops-ir-lifecycle.*"}[1m])) / (sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container="taskmanager", pod=~"aiops-ir-lifecycle.*"}[1m])) + sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_seconds_total{container="taskmanager", pod=~"aiops-ir-lifecycle.*"}[1m])))

avg(sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_seconds_total{container="taskmanager", pod=~"aiops-ir-lifecycle.*"}[1m])) / (sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container="taskmanager", pod=~"aiops-ir-lifecycle.*"}[1m])) + sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_seconds_total{container="taskmanager", pod=~"aiops-ir-lifecycle.*"}[1m]))))

panels.description: Highlights data skew in the event input topic. A heavily loaded partition indicates that an event source is not setting the event key correctly.
panels.title: Event input topic partition balence

panels.title: Kafka producer batch size (avg)

panels.description: Average time between a message being emitted and it being sent. This will be affected by the linger time.

panels.description: Max size of each message batch
panels.title: Kafka producer batch size (max)

panels.description: Maximum time between a message being emitted and it being sent. This will be affected by the linger time.
panels.title: Outgoing producer request latency (max)

panels.description: Ratio of uncompressed vs compressed batch size
panels.title: Outgoing producer compression ratio

panels.description: Highlights data skew in the alert input topic. A heavily loaded partition indicates that an event source is not setting the event key correctly.
